short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically tracks the job which the user applies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic Job Tracker is a Chrome extension currently in beta testing, designed to simplify and automate the process of tracking your job applications. This tool automatically captures job details from career pages and keeps a well-organized record of your applications in one place. Currently under development, this extension is actively evolving with new features and improvements. Whether you're applying on LinkedIn or company career pages, Automatic Job Tracker helps you stay organized and focused during your job search.
